thoughts.text: I received a response from the 'browse_website' command stating that the 'Identifying Trees of Michigan: E2332 Revised 2022' publication can be downloaded as a file from the Michigan State University Extension website. I will use the 'google' command to search for the Michigan State University Extension website and download the publication from there.
thoughts.reasoning: Since the 'browse_website' command informed me that the 'Identifying Trees of Michigan: E2332 Revised 2022' publication can be downloaded as a file from the Michigan State University Extension website, I will use the 'google' command to search for the website and download the publication from there. thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'google' command to search for the Michigan State University Extension website
- Use the website to download the 'Identifying Trees of Michigan: E2332 Revised 2022' publication
- Use the publication to create an outline for the article
- Use the 'write_to_file' command to create a new file for the article
- Use the outline to write the first draft of the article
- Use the 'read_file' command to check the article for errors and make any necessary corrections
- Use the 'send_tweet' command to share the final version of the article with my Twitter followers
